snippet: An Israeli police officer was fatally shot and his wife and young son were wounded as they drove to a Passover Seder near the West Bank city of Hebron.
abstract: Israeli police officer is fatally shot and his wife and young son are wounded as they drive to Passover Seder near the West Bank city of Hebron; it is the first killing of an Israeli civilian in the West Bank since October 2013.
lead_paragraph: An Israeli police officer was fatally shot and his wife and young son were wounded as they drove to a Passover Seder near the West Bank city of Hebron.

headline.main: Israeli Officer Killed on Way to Seder in West Bank
headline.print_headline: Israeli Officer Killed on Way to Seder in West Bank
